enum  ZclBufferType_t {
  ZCL_UNKNOWN_BUFFER = 0x0,
  ZCL_OUTPUT_DATA_BUFFER = 0x1,
  ZCL_INPUT_DATA_BUFFER = 0x2,
  ZCL_OUTPUT_RESPONSE_BUFFER = 0x3,
  ZCL_OUTPUT_REPORT_BUFFER = 0x4,
  ZCL_BUFFER_TYPE_LAST
}

Detailed Description

The header file describes the ZCL Memory Manager interface.

Definition in file zclMemoryManager.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ZclBufferType_t
Enumerator:
ZCL_UNKNOWN_BUFFER 

Value for free buffer

ZCL_OUTPUT_DATA_BUFFER 

Output packet from APL component.

ZCL_INPUT_DATA_BUFFER 

Input packet from APS-layer.

ZCL_OUTPUT_RESPONSE_BUFFER 

Output packet from ZCL-layer(response).

ZCL_OUTPUT_REPORT_BUFFER 

Output packet from ZCL-layer (report).

Definition at line 40 of file zclMemoryManager.h.

Function Documentation

ZclMmBuffer_t* zclMmGetMem ( ZclBufferType_t  type)

Looks for and returns free zcl memory buffer.

Parameters:
[in]type- the type of a buffer
Returns:
pointer to memory buffer or NULL if there is no free buffer
void zclMmFreeMem ( ZclMmBuffer_t *  mem)

Frees zcl buffer.

Parameters:
[in]mem- pointer to used zcl buffer
ZclMmBufferDescriptor_t* zclMmGetNextOutputMemDescriptor ( ZclMmBufferDescriptor_t *  descr)

Gets next zcl memory buffer descriptor or the first one if mem is NULL with output request.

Parameters:
[in]descr- pointer to current zcl buffer descriptor
Returns:
pointer to the next busy zcl memory buffer descriptor or NULL if no next busy zcl memory buffer descriptor is available
